name: Nemesis
overview: Nemesis is a text adventure for the VIC-20. An agent of SAA6, your grim boss has just given you your newest assignment. Dr Katz and his daughter Cerra have been kidnapped and taken to Nemesis, located somewhere in the Amazon. Game play is divided into two parts, finding the entrance to Nemesis and then rescuing Cerra and her father. The player must solve a number of puzzles, including defending from angry bears and repairing robots. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry. A help option provides the player clues to solve puzzles. Published in VICTAPE Computing No 10 from May/Jun 1985.
